venue.address_1: Corner of Rt 66 and Harvestwood Rd.
venue.name: Eckankar Temple of Connecticut

item.description:
Welcome to a weekend seminar, the annual Connecticut Eckankar Regional seminar, where we meet to explore the spiritual nature of ourselves as Soul through workshops, group discussions, talks, and creative arts. We will have a variety of dynamic speakers to inspire you on your own personal quest. Come share a weekend filled with opportunity to explore your inner worlds. Free to newcomers and their guests.

Friday evening: 7:30PM - 10PM at the Eckankar Temple of Connecticut in Middlefield

Saturday: 9:15AM to 9:30PM at the Crowne Plaza Hotel in Cromwell

Sunday morning: 9:00AM to 12:00PM at the Eckankar Temple

For more information please visit:

http://www.ct-eckankar.org/regional-seminar.html

Hope to see you there!

--Isa
item.how_to_find_us: Friday evening Bob and Isa will be sitting at the Guest Information Table in the Temple Foyer

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Connecticut Eckankar Regional Seminar
